articles.author: Sanam Mirchandani
articles.title: I am suspicious of the rally in US, India: Christopher Wood - Economic Times
articles.description: My view is that it is a bear market rally in the US. The reason to be sceptical about the rally in America is that you have a double whammy - tightening of higher rates and shrinking balance sheets - which is negative for liquidity.
articles.content: Christopher Wood, global head of equity strategy at Jefferies, says the recent run-up in equities is more of a bear market rally in the US, which Indian stocks are tailing. In an interview with Sanam… [+4266 chars]
